title: Let's Make A Deal Without the Full Monte
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Let's Make A Deal Without the Full Monte
posts.post_content:
Offering 7 cards today.  Buy as many as you like.  No goats.  No Doors.

1 Red Murray with Bat SC350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10171/murray-batting[/IMG]

$71 shipped in BVG 5 condition

2 Frank Smith (F on card) P150

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10207/smith-f[/IMG]

$48 shipped in BVG 3.5 condition - centered 

3 Harry Krause (Portrait) P350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/53811/krause-portrait[/IMG]

$OLD shipped in SGC 50 condition

4 Bob Rhoads (Ready to Pitch) P350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10188/rhoades-ready-to-pitch[/IMG]

$45 shipped in BVG 4 condition - centered

5 Solly Hofman P350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10257/hofman[/IMG]

$OLD shipped in SGC 40 condition

6 Harry Steinfeldt (Portrait) SC350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10317/steinfeldt-portrait[/IMG]

$29 shipped in SGC 30 condition

7 Cy Seymour (Batting) P350

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10312/seymour-batting[/IMG]

$OLD shipped in SGC 50 condition

Prices are net to me.  F & F preferred
